title: The disclosure tone, earnings management, and earnings quality: evidence found in Indonesia listed manufacturing industry
abstract: This research studies the association of Earnings Management, Earnings Quality with Disclosure Tone. This research will be conducted using the sample data on 61 manufacturing companies in Indonesia that has been listed in IDX during the 5-year period of 2017-2021. This research will use NVivo and GRETL software for data analysis technique .Consistent result has been found in this research that there is association between EM and EQ with Disclosure Tone. The author also found the same association in this research.
contributors: Saarce Elsye Hatane (Advisor 1); Oviliani Yenty Yuliana, S.T., MS-CIS., Ph.D. (Advisor 2); Josua Tarigan (Examination Committee 1)
